title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 150.5 - Propelling float against gate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 150.5 - Propelling float against gate

State Regulations

Any person who propels a float to or against any lock gate, or, being in control of such float, permits it to be propelled against any lock
gate, buffer beam or other structure, for the purposes of opening, closing or
otherwise operating the same, shall be deemed guilty of violating the foregoing
section and shall be subject to the penalty therefor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
150.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
